movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.info: Batman faces his greatest challenge yet when the Joker, a brilliant and ruthless criminal mastermind, throws Gotham City into chaos.

movies.title: Clueless
movies.info: A wealthy and popular high school student, Cher Horowitz, navigates the complexities of teenage life, love, and friendship.

movies.title: Pretty Woman
movies.info: A wealthy businessman hires a Hollywood prostitute to be his escort for a week, but their relationship develops into something unexpected.

movies.title: Charlie Chaplin - The Great Dictator
movies.info: A Jewish barber mistaken for a dictator in a totalitarian state uses his platform to speak out against fascism and oppression.

movies.title: Howl's Moving Castle
movies.info: A young woman cursed with old age seeks the help of a mysterious wizard, Howl, who lives in a walking castle.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.info: A young girl enters a magical world and must find a way to save her parents from a witch's curse.

movies.title: Princess Mononoke
movies.info: A young warrior must find a way to bring peace between the humans and the forest spirits who are fighting over the land.

movies.title: The Iron Giant
movies.info: A young boy befriends a giant robot who has crash-landed on Earth and must protect him from the government.

movies.title: Whisper of the Heart
movies.info: A young girl discovers her passion for writing and finds inspiration in a mysterious cat.

movies.title: Perfect Blue
movies.info: A pop singer struggles to maintain her sanity as her identity blurs with that of her stalker.

movies.title: The Road to El Dorado
movies.info: Two con men stumble upon a map to the lost city of El Dorado and set out on a quest for riches and adventure.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings - The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.info: A hobbit named Frodo inherits a powerful ring and must journey to Mordor to destroy it before the evil Sauron conquers Middle-earth.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings - The Two Towers
movies.info: Frodo and Sam continue their perilous journey to Mordor, while Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli pursue the orcs who have captured Merry and Pippin.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings - The Return of the King
movies.info: The final battle for Middle-earth begins as Frodo and Sam face the ultimate test of their courage and friendship.

movies.title: Star Wars - Episode I
movies.info: A young Anakin Skywalker is discovered as a powerful Jedi and joins the fight against the evil Sith Lord Darth Maul.

movies.title: Star Wars - Episode II
movies.info: Anakin struggles with his growing powers and the temptations of the dark side while the Republic faces a new threat from the Separatist movement.

movies.title: Star Wars - Episode III
movies.info: The Clone Wars escalate as Anakin succumbs to the dark side and becomes Darth Vader, while Obi-Wan Kenobi faces his former apprentice in a climactic lightsaber duel.

movies.title: Star Wars - Episode VI
movies.info: Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Princess Leia join forces with the Rebel Alliance to fight the evil Galactic Empire and rescue Princess Leia from the clutches of Darth Vader.

movies.title: Star Wars - Episode V
movies.info: Luke Skywalker confronts Darth Vader and learns the truth about his father, while Han Solo is captured by the bounty hunter Boba Fett.

movies.title: Star Wars - Episode VI
movies.info: The Rebel Alliance launches a daring attack on the second Death Star, hoping to destroy the Empire's ultimate weapon and bring peace to the galaxy.
